title: Particle motion along parametricly def. path part - e

content.question: Write and evaluate an integral expression, in terms of sine and cosine, that gives the distance the particle travels from t = 1.25 and t = 1.75 .

frqParts.text: Write and evaluate an integral expression, in terms of sine and cosine, that gives the distance the particle travels from t = 1.25 and t = 1.75 .

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

topic.text: 9.6: (BC ONLY) Solving Motion Problems Using Parametric and Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
